description: Defines the color of each raster cell based on the value of a numeric attribute. Colors are assigned based on classed ranges of data.
title: Raster ClassBreaks Renderer

$eref.description: Options available for the renderer legend.
$eref.title: Renderer Legend Options

___legendOptions.description: A legend containing one title, which is a string describing the renderer in the legend.

___defaultLabel.description: Default label for the default symbol used to draw unspecified values.

___field.description: The name of the field that is used for the renderer.

___type.description: Specifies the type of renderer used.

esriDocumentation.additionalInformation: The authoringInfo object is not required with a renderer. It is only used if rendering was generated using the Scene Viewer rendering tools. All snippets provided below show a portion of what is contained within `authoringInfo`. Please refer to the sample snippets in the [authoringInfo visual variable](authoringInfo_visualVariable.md) object for additional help.

$eref.description: The authoringInfo is an object containing metadata about the authoring process for creating a renderer object. This allows the authoring clients to save specific overridable settings so that next time it is accessed via an authoring client, their selections are remembered. Non-authoring clients can ignore it. Properties for color/size/transparency sliders, theme selection, classification information, and additional properties are saved within this object.
$eref.title: authoringInfo

___classificationMethod.description: Used for classed color or size. The default value is `esriClassifyManual`.

___fields.description: An array of string values representing field names used for creating predominance renderers.

___type.description: Used in case of classed renderers.

___lengthUnit.description: Unit used in user interfaces to display world/map sizes and distances

___visualVariables.description: An array of visualVariable objects containing additional information needed when authoring the renderer.

___standardDeviationInterval.description: Use this property if the classificationMethod is `esriClassifyStandardDeviation`.

___authoringInfo.description: An object containing metadata about the authoring process for creating a renderer object. This allows the authoring clients to save specific overridable settings so that next time it is accessed via the UI, their selections are remembered. Non-authoring clients can ignore it.

___colorClassBreakInfos.description: Each element in the array is an object that provides information about a class break associated with the renderer.

$eref.description: The classBreaksInfo object provides information about the class breaks associated with the renderer.
$eref.title: colorClassBreakInfo

___description.description: String value used to describe the class.

___classMaxValue.description: A numeric value used to specify the maximum value for a break.

___classMinValue.description: A numeric value used to specify discontinuous class breaks. If this value is null or is missing, the map server will calculate the minimum value based on the preceding class' maximum value.

___label.description: String value used to label the class.

$eref.description: Color is represented as a three or four-element array. The four elements represent values for red, green, blue, and alpha in that order. Values range from 0 through 255. If color is undefined for a symbol, the color value is null.
$eref.title: color

___defaultColor.description: The defaultColor on the renderer that get assigned to features with no value or features that do not fall within the configured data.

___normalizationTotal.description: Used when normalizationType is percent-of-total, this number property contains the total of all data values.

___normalizationType.description: Determine how the data was normalized.

___normalizationField.description: Used when normalizationType is field. The string value indicating the attribute field by which the data value is normalized.
